author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Make D86 version with the new muonYoke file and to make a new scenario 2026D88 with the new MTD version

#### PR validation:

Use the runTheMatrix test workflows 38634.0 and 39434.0

Nothing special
title: Phase2-gex100 Make D86 version with the new muonYoke file and to make a new scenario 2026D88 with the new MTD version
